ai-atk-s0102a1:134_6: Therefore he having taken form internally, he has attained perfection and has attained the undefiled freedom of heart and freedom by wisdom in this way. Then he is freed both ways: “This is free from reference to the impediments of each other.”
ai-atk-s0102a1:134_7: But this is what was said by the words:
ai-atk-s0102a1:134_9: It’s someone who does have direct meditative experience of the eight liberations, and one who has ended the defilements is freed both ways.”
ai-atk-s0102a1:135_0: Ānanda, this freedom is shared within both ways.
ai-atk-s0102a1:136_0: Thus in this way the Dīghalayan Tree
ai-atk-s0102a1:137_0: The Great Being Cause is finished.
